ValidationRule.description: NSS can not change the Account name for a current client
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( BEGINS( $Profile.Name, 'NSS'), ISCHANGED( Name ) , NOT(ISBLANK(Bis_ID__c)),ISBLANK( Lost_Date__c)), AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Administrator')), PRIORVALUE(Name)='Paychex ESR Inquiries', PRIORVALUE(Name)!= Name) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the name of a current client.
